title: (x) Marvel logo - Futura Cond (customized) {Mark S}
content: [Futura Condensed Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110141302/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/condensed-extra-bold/testdrive.html?s=MARVEL&p=48), but they altered the M. It's also been condensed slightly.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content:
Thanks for the quick reply.   
   
You're right, it does look like Futura Condensed Extra Bold, however, the M isn't just condensed, it doesn't have sloping sides. The Marvel M is straight-sided.   
   
Are you sure?   
   
Matt

Hehe - sorry, I read his reply again. I understand now (wow, do I feel like a newbie!).   
   
Thanks again for the quick response, Mark, and for your welcoming words, Yves.   
   
Bye for now,   
   
Matt
